name: cv_system_compiler
description: Compiles modular CV knowledge base into a single LLM-friendly context file.

scripts.compile: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.job:fetch: cd job-monitoring && bash -c 'source ../.venv/bin/activate && python -m job_monitor.cli scan --config config.yaml --full-details'
